name: Prehistoric RampAGE
description:
Team "sin^2(x) + cos^2(x)" Presents!

Under the theme of "Shift", you have to go about shifting humans away to safety from the crazy dinosaur rampaging through town! In addition, there are mysterious lego bricks on the ground that you can utilize by shifting them in the dinosaur's way to slow it down to buy more time for you to save the humans!

Gameplay Instructions:

Use your mouse to drag and drop the Lego Bricks or humans in order to shift them to their respective places. Be careful, losing too many humans to the dinosaur will make you lose the game!

Press "P" to pause the game.
